  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Funciones. Formas de expresar una función</string>
            <string language="en">Functions. Ways to express a function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktionen. Methoden, eine Funktion 
auszudrücken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions. Voies d'exprimer une fonction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções. Maneiras expressar uma função</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni. Modi esprimere una funzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργίες. Τρόποι να εκφραστεί μια λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de función real de variable real. Se presentan también algunas de las propiedades y características más importantes de las funciones: dominio, recorrido, crecimiento, decrecimiento. También se estudian algunos ejemplos elementales: funciones lineales y de proporcionalidad inversa.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of real-valued functions. The main properties and features of functions are studied: domain, image, increase and decrease. Some elementary examples are given: linear functions and inverse proportionality.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proporcionalidad inversa</string>
            <string language="en">inverse proportionality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lineal</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">crecimiento</string>
            <string language="en">increase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recorrido</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">decrecimiento</string>
            <string language="en">decrease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">dominio</string>
            <string language="en">domain</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept von Realwertfunktionen zu studieren. 
Die Haupteigenschaften und die Merkmale von Funktionen werden 
studiert: Gebiet, Bild, Zunahme und Abnahme. Einige 
grundlegende Beispiele werden gegeben: lineare Funktionen und 
umgekehrte Proportionatität.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept des fonctions à valeurs réelles. 
Les propriétés et les dispositifs principaux des fonctions 
sont étudiés : domaine, image, augmentation et diminution. 
Quelques exemples élémentaires sont donnés : fonctions 
linéaires et proportionnalité inverse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o 
conceito de funções real-valued. As propriedades e as 
características principais das funções são estudadas: 
domínio, imagem, aumento e diminuição. Alguns exemplos 
elementares são dados: funções lineares e proportionality 
inverso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni studiare 
il concetto delle funzioni real-valued. Le proprietà e le 
caratteristiche principali delle funzioni sono studiate: 
settore, immagine, aumento e diminuzione. Alcuni esempi 
elementari sono forniti: funzioni lineari e proporzionalità 
inversa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια των real-valued λειτουργιών. 
Οι βασικά ιδιότητες και τα χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα των 
λειτουργιών μελετώνται: δικτυακή γειτονιά, εικόνα, αύξηση 
και μείωση. Μερικά στοιχειώδη παραδείγματα δίνονται: 
γραμμικές λειτουργίες και αντίστροφη αναλογικότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umgekehrte Proportionatität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zunahme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abnahme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebiet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">proportionnalité inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">linéaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
